/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. Trees line the street, their green leaves contrasting with the urban landscape. Cars and pedestrians animate the scene, adding life to the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, capturing the vibrancy and energy of the city.
